item.title: The Grand Seduction - Opening Night Film
item.description: Cinequest opens in grand fashion as the lights dim, and we present an uproarious comedy from director Don McKellar (Last Night) and screenwriter Michael Dowse (Goon), starring a brilliant cast that includes Brendan Gleeson ("Mad-Eye" Moody from the Harry Potter...

item.title: Cinequest 2014 Passes On Sale!
item.description: Cinequest Film Festival 2014 Passes Are On Sale! Transform your festival experience as a VIP, be true to your inner-Maverick, or soak up all of the films as a Film Lover.
